definitions.definition: Oxidation or discoloration, especially of a decorative metal exposed to air.
To oxidize or discolor due to oxidation.
definitions.example: Careful storage of silver will prevent it from tarnishing.

definitions.definition: To soil, sully, damage or compromise
definitions.example: He is afraid that he will tarnish his reputation if he disagrees.

definitions.definition: To lose its lustre or attraction; to become dull.
